1. Total duration of examination is defined on the exam panel for theory exam and for viva voce. 2.All the questions are mandatory.You need to answer all the questions in order to proceed. 3. The clock will be set at the server. The countdown timer in the top right corner of screen will display the remaining time available for you to complete the examination. 4. The Question Palette displayed on the right side of screen will show the status of each question using one of the following symbols:
5. If candidate did not answer the Question, it will be consider as Not Answered. and the Exam will not be submitted
6. There will be no negative marking. 7. To answer a question, do the following: 7.1 Click on the question number in the Question Palette at the right of your screen to go to that numbered question directly. Note that using this option does NOT save your answer to the current question.
7.2 Click on Mark for Review to mark any question for review.
8 Procedure for answering a multiple choice type question:
8.1 To select your answer, click on the button of one of the options. 8.2 Click Skip,Previous or next to move between questions. 8.3 To mark the question for review, click on Mark for Review 9 Dont quit the application in between exam else the exam will not be submitted • A certification program under PMKVY to provide recognition to the informal learning or learning through work to get equal acceptance as the formal levels of education.
• It aims to appreciate prior learning irrespective of the medium of achieving it. In short, RPL is a process of assessment of an individual’s prior learning to give due importance to learning as an outcome rather than learning as process.
Benefits Under RPL 4.0 – BICE Benefits to Employee :- 1)No fee charged for assessment and certification 2)Successfully certified candidates shall receive a pay-out of Rs 500 3) 3 year accidental insurance INR 2 Lakhs free of cost 4) Skill certificate can be further used for taking up next level of job role in the respective skill sector First Name* Middle Name Last Name* Date of Birth* Gender* Mobile No* Alternate Number Landline No Email Id Address Line1* Enter your city Help contact us FAQ Technical Support
